android.car

类 CarProjectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.CarProjectionManager

  • public final class CarProjectionManager
extends CarManagerBase
    CarProjectionManager allows applications implementing projection to register/unregister itself with projection manager, listen for voice notification. A client must have Car.PERMISSION_CAR_PROJECTION permission in order to access this manager.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  CarProjectionManager.CarProjectionListener
      Listener to get projected notifications.
      static interface  CarProjectionManager.KeyEventNum 
      static class  CarProjectionManager.ProjectionAccessPointCallback
      Callback class for applications to receive updates about the LocalOnlyHotspot status.
      static interface  CarProjectionManager.ProjectionKeyEventHandler
      Interface for projection apps to receive and handle key events from the system.
      static interface  CarProjectionManager.ProjectionStatusListener
      Interface to receive for projection status updates.

      Release an inhibit request made by requestBluetoothProfileInhibit(BluetoothDevice, int), and reconnect the profile if no other inhibit requests are active.

      Removes a previously registered CarProjectionManager.ProjectionKeyEventHandler.
      boolean requestBluetoothProfileInhibit(BluetoothDevice device, int profile)
      Request to disconnect the given profile on the given device, and prevent it from reconnecting until either the request is released, or the process owning the given token dies.

      Resets projection access point credentials if system was configured to persist local-only hotspot credentials.

      Request to start Wi-Fi access point if it hasn't been started yet for wireless projection receiver app.

      Unregister listener and stop listening projection events.

      Unregisters projection runner on projection stop with projection service to create reverse binding.

      • PROJECTION_VOICE_SEARCH

        @Deprecated
public static final int PROJECTION_VOICE_SEARCH
        已过时。 Use addKeyEventHandler(Set, ProjectionKeyEventHandler) with the KEY_EVENT_VOICE_SEARCH_SHORT_PRESS_KEY_UP event instead.
        Flag for registerProjectionListener(CarProjectionListener, int): subscribe to voice-search short-press requests.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • PROJECTION_LONG_PRESS_VOICE_SEARCH

        @Deprecated
public static final int PROJECTION_LONG_PRESS_VOICE_SEARCH
        已过时。 Use addKeyEventHandler(Set, ProjectionKeyEventHandler) with the KEY_EVENT_VOICE_SEARCH_LONG_PRESS_KEY_DOWN event instead.
        Flag for registerProjectionListener(CarProjectionListener, int): subscribe to voice-search long-press requests.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • KEY_EVENT_VOICE_SEARCH_KEY_DOWN

        public static final int KEY_EVENT_VOICE_SEARCH_KEY_DOWN
        Event for addKeyEventHandler(java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>, android.car.CarProjectionManager.ProjectionKeyEventHandler): fired when the KeyEvent#KEYCODE_VOICE_ASSIST key is pressed down. If the key is released before the long-press timeout, KEY_EVENT_VOICE_SEARCH_SHORT_PRESS_KEY_UP will be fired. If the key is held past the long-press timeout, KEY_EVENT_VOICE_SEARCH_LONG_PRESS_KEY_DOWN will be fired, followed by KEY_EVENT_VOICE_SEARCH_LONG_PRESS_KEY_UP.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • KEY_EVENT_VOICE_SEARCH_SHORT_PRESS_KEY_UP

        public static final int KEY_EVENT_VOICE_SEARCH_SHORT_PRESS_KEY_UP
        Event for addKeyEventHandler(java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>, android.car.CarProjectionManager.ProjectionKeyEventHandler): fired when the KeyEvent#KEYCODE_VOICE_ASSIST key is released after a short-press.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • KEY_EVENT_CALL_KEY_DOWN

        public static final int KEY_EVENT_CALL_KEY_DOWN
        Event for addKeyEventHandler(java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>, android.car.CarProjectionManager.ProjectionKeyEventHandler): fired when the KeyEvent#KEYCODE_CALL key is pressed down. If the key is released before the long-press timeout, KEY_EVENT_CALL_SHORT_PRESS_KEY_UP will be fired. If the key is held past the long-press timeout, KEY_EVENT_CALL_LONG_PRESS_KEY_DOWN will be fired, followed by KEY_EVENT_CALL_LONG_PRESS_KEY_UP.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • regsiterProjectionListener

        @Deprecated
public void regsiterProjectionListener(CarProjectionManager.CarProjectionListener listener,
                                                    int voiceSearchFilter)
        已过时。 Use registerProjectionListener(CarProjectionListener, int) instead.
        Compatibility with previous APIs due to typo

      • registerProjectionListener

        public void registerProjectionListener(CarProjectionManager.CarProjectionListener listener,
                                       int voiceSearchFilter)
        Register listener to monitor projection. Only one listener can be registered and registering multiple times will lead into only the last listener to be active.
        参数:
        listener -
        voiceSearchFilter - Flags of voice search requests to get notification.

      • unregsiterProjectionListener

        @Deprecated
public void unregsiterProjectionListener()
        已过时。 Use {@link CarProjectionManager#unregisterProjectionListener() instead.
        Compatibility with previous APIs due to typo

      • unregisterProjectionListener

        public void unregisterProjectionListener()
        Unregister listener and stop listening projection events.

      • addKeyEventHandler

        public void addKeyEventHandler(java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> events,
                               CarProjectionManager.ProjectionKeyEventHandler eventHandler)
        Adds a CarProjectionManager.ProjectionKeyEventHandler to be called for the given set of key events. If the given event handler is already registered, the event set and Executor for that event handler will be replaced with those provided. For any event with a defined event handler, the system will suppress its default behavior for that event, and call the event handler instead. (For instance, if an event handler is defined for KEY_EVENT_CALL_SHORT_PRESS_KEY_UP, the system will not open the dialer when the CALL key is short-pressed.) Callbacks on the event handler will be run on the Handler designated to run callbacks from Car.
        参数:
        events - The set of key events to which to subscribe.
        eventHandler - The CarProjectionManager.ProjectionKeyEventHandler to call when those events occur.

      • addKeyEventHandler

        public void addKeyEventHandler(java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> events,
                               java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor,
                               CarProjectionManager.ProjectionKeyEventHandler eventHandler)
        Adds a CarProjectionManager.ProjectionKeyEventHandler to be called for the given set of key events. If the given event handler is already registered, the event set and Executor for that event handler will be replaced with those provided. For any event with a defined event handler, the system will suppress its default behavior for that event, and call the event handler instead. (For instance, if an event handler is defined for KEY_EVENT_CALL_SHORT_PRESS_KEY_UP, the system will not open the dialer when the CALL key is short-pressed.) Callbacks on the event handler will be run on the given Executor, or, if it is null, the Handler designated to run callbacks for Car.
        参数:
        events - The set of key events to which to subscribe.
        callbackExecutor - An Executor on which to run callbacks.
        eventHandler - The CarProjectionManager.ProjectionKeyEventHandler to call when those events occur.

      • removeKeyEventHandler

        public void removeKeyEventHandler(CarProjectionManager.ProjectionKeyEventHandler eventHandler)
        Removes a previously registered CarProjectionManager.ProjectionKeyEventHandler.
        参数:
        eventHandler - The listener to remove.

      • registerProjectionRunner

        public void registerProjectionRunner(Intent serviceIntent)
        Registers projection runner on projection start with projection service to create reverse binding.
        参数:
        serviceIntent -

      • unregisterProjectionRunner

        public void unregisterProjectionRunner(Intent serviceIntent)
        Unregisters projection runner on projection stop with projection service to create reverse binding.
        参数:
        serviceIntent -

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • startProjectionAccessPoint

        public void startProjectionAccessPoint(CarProjectionManager.ProjectionAccessPointCallback callback)
        Request to start Wi-Fi access point if it hasn't been started yet for wireless projection receiver app.

        A process can have only one request to start an access point, subsequent call of this method will invalidate previous calls.

        参数:
        callback - to receive notifications when access point status changed for the request

      • getAvailableWifiChannels

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAvailableWifiChannels(int band)
        Returns a list of available Wi-Fi channels. A channel is specified as frequency in MHz, e.g. channel 1 will be represented as 2412 in the list.
        参数:
        band - one of the values from android.net.wifi.WifiScanner#WIFI_BAND_*

      • stopProjectionAccessPoint

        public void stopProjectionAccessPoint()
        Stop Wi-Fi Access Point for wireless projection receiver app.

      • requestBluetoothProfileInhibit

        public boolean requestBluetoothProfileInhibit(BluetoothDevice device,
                                              int profile)
        Request to disconnect the given profile on the given device, and prevent it from reconnecting until either the request is released, or the process owning the given token dies.
        参数:
        device - The device on which to inhibit a profile.
        profile - The android.bluetooth.BluetoothProfile to inhibit.
        返回:
        True if the profile was successfully inhibited, false if an error occurred.

      • releaseBluetoothProfileInhibit

        public boolean releaseBluetoothProfileInhibit(BluetoothDevice device,
                                              int profile)
        Release an inhibit request made by requestBluetoothProfileInhibit(BluetoothDevice, int), and reconnect the profile if no other inhibit requests are active.
        参数:
        device - The device on which to release the inhibit request.
        profile - The profile on which to release the inhibit request.
        返回:
        True if the request was released, false if an error occurred.

      • updateProjectionStatus

        public void updateProjectionStatus(ProjectionStatus status)
        Call this method to report projection status of your app. The aggregated status (from other projection apps if available) will be broadcasted to interested parties.
        参数:
        status - the reported status that will be distributed to the interested listeners
        另请参阅:
        registerProjectionStatusListener(ProjectionStatusListener)

      • registerProjectionStatusListener

        public void registerProjectionStatusListener(CarProjectionManager.ProjectionStatusListener listener)
        Register projection status listener. See CarProjectionManager.ProjectionStatusListener for details. It is allowed to register multiple listeners.

        Note: provided listener will be called immediately with the most recent status.

        参数:
        listener - the listener to receive notification for any projection status changes

      • unregisterProjectionStatusListener

        public void unregisterProjectionStatusListener(CarProjectionManager.ProjectionStatusListener listener)
        Unregister provided listener from projection status notifications
        参数:
        listener - the listener for projection status notifications that was previously registered with unregisterProjectionStatusListener(ProjectionStatusListener)

      • getProjectionOptions

        public Bundle getProjectionOptions()
        Returns Bundle object that contains customization for projection app. This bundle can be parsed using ProjectionOptions.

      • resetProjectionAccessPointCredentials

        public void resetProjectionAccessPointCredentials()
        Resets projection access point credentials if system was configured to persist local-only hotspot credentials.
